name: winery bikeride
description:
Four of us drove up to the Sonoma wine country
(Alexander Valley mostly) on a day that wound up being super hot
for a relaxing bikeride.  After being in the 100s, we decided
to bike up to the promising sounding Lake Sonoma and then
jumped into it spontaneously in our reduced bike clothes!  8-)

A *gorgeous* bikeride that we plan to do again!
